descriptionHtml:
(my main mod: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/44371//?
it contains tons of brutal orcish berserk weapons ... oh, and as a new feature, also some retexes for the folks that dont like orichalcum... steel, copper, blue steel, black n other stuff :P )

since i didnt put any pictures here, this is what this "i-celebrate-my-14th-endorsement-on-my-main-mod-special-happy-happy-joy-joy-thingy" does:
it just adds a flute, stats of a daedric mace, as a blunt weapon. so you can smack ppl with a flute... :)

go to console, 
help "flutemace"
player.additem "id" "nr of flutes you want to smack ppl with"

have fun :P
author: chicky540
